english.segment1: God asks the question, "Whom shall I send?". Now what will we answer? Will we go and do as he says?. All that he wants is a heart, ready, willing and waiting
english.segment2: Here I am. I surrender my life to the use of your plan. Here I am. I will do as you say I will go where you send. Here I am
english.segment3: Jesus commanded us "Go and tell the good news". For the harvest is many but the workers are so few. All that he wants is a heart, believing, serving and loving him
english.segment4: Here I am. I surrender my life to the use of your plan. Here I am. I will do as you say I will go where you send. (repeat)
english.segment5: Lord I give myself to you, my God I trust you. Lord, tell me your ways, show me how to live. Guide me in your truth and teach me my God, my Savior
english.segment6: Here I am. I surrender my life to the use of your plan. Here I am. I will do as you say I will go where you send. (chorus repeated)
